quotes.quote: And so the lion fell in love with the lamb...
And third, I was unconditionally and irrevocably in love with him.
What if I'm not a superhero. What if I'm the bad guy?
If I could dream at all, it would be about you.
Darkness is so predictable, don't you think?
Stupid, shiny Volvo owner.
You're intoxicated by my very presence.
No blood, no foul.
Yes, you are exactly my brand of heroin.
Well, I'm so sorry that I can't be the right kind of monster for you, Bella.
The smile broke across his face the way the sunrise set the clouds on fire...
No, Emmett, I punched a werewolf in the face.
I am Switzerland. I refuse to be affected by territorial disputes between mythical creatures.
Does it bother you, me being half naked all the time?
And now look what's become of you! Trying to seduce a vampire.
How can someone so tiny be so annoying?
Of course, youâ€™d warm up faster if you took your clothes off.
Yes, because a vampire slumber party is the pinnacle of safety conscious behavior.
I was just wondering why you stabbed him. Not that I object.
If we could bottle your luck, we'd have a weapon of mass destruction on our hands.
You nicked-named my daughter after the Lock Ness Monster!
Nudity was an inconvenient but unavoidable part of pack life.
And then I saw the way he looked at her... like he was a blind man, seeing the sun for the very first time.
I'm joining your crappy little renegade pack. The vampires' guard dogs.
Say what you want, I still think Dracula One and Dracula Two are creep-tacular.

edward_comments.author: Christian
edward_comments.comment: I tried on puffy paint and made myself sparkle! cool!

edward_comments.comment: if i were a vampire... i would def be vegetarian too

edward_comments.comment: Edward is the best vampire character EVER written!

jacob_comments.comment: I wanna be a real werewolf!!!

jacob_comments.comment: I would DIE to be Reenneessmmee!

jacob_comments.comment: jacob was ruined in breaking dawn ugh
